content.rendered:
Home

Open Days

Virtual Open Day

Our next virtual open day is on 8th May, 2021 from 12pm to 2pm.

Register now
Are you interested in studying for one of our Foundation Year routes, Foundation Degrees, Bachelor’s degrees, Top-up degree or Master’s degrees? Why not come along to our virtual open day and find out what Regent College London has to offer.

At our virtual open day you will hear from our Principal, Heads of Schools, expert Academic Faculty, Recruitment and Admissions Officers, Student Finance Manager about applying and studying at Regent College London. You can find out all you need to know about our higher education courses, our transformational learning programmes and the digital delivery of our courses. Or you could ask our students directly about their experience.

Why Attend a Virtual Open Day?
  • Find out about our range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses
  • Meet and chat online with the various Heads of Schools
  • Chat with our recruitment team about the course entry requirements and the application process
  • Find out about our English language requirements and free English language support
  • Get information and guidance on Student Finance
  • Get your questions answered and find out which course is best suited for you

To keep you safe, we are continuing to monitor and follow government guidance on events and public gatherings. Whether virtually or in person, you’ll get a real feel of the courses, people and student experience at Regent College London.

Our next Open days are on:
Saturday, 8th May. From 12pm to 2pm
Register now
Thursday, 27th May. From 4.30pm to 6.30pm
Register now
Monday, 7th June. From 4.30pm to 6.30pm
Register now

Courses

Find the right course for you

Virtual Open Day – Agenda

Saturday, 8th May. From 12pm to 2pm

  • Welcome – Mrs Kylie Hazeldine, Head of ARWA and Partnerships
  • Why Studying with Regent is the right choice – Mr Miren Shah, Head of Recruitment
  • A word from the Principal – Dr Selva Pankaj
  • Break out sessions
    • More than just academic learning – an introduction to our transformational learning programmes – Dr Chris Wood, Head of Research, Publishing and Enrichment
    • Digital academic delivery
    • Chat with the Principal and meet and greet with the ARWA Team
  • Subject talks and taster sessions – Mr Bushan Mohan, Academic Dean
    • School of Business and Enterprise – Mr Mohammad T Islam, Head of School
    • School of Allied Health – Dr Morris A Anglin, Head of School
    • School of Computing & AI – Dr Anthony ‘Skip’ Basiel, Head of School
  • Break out sessions
    • How to apply – Ms Anelis Tarabuta, Admissions, Recruitment and Widening Access (ARWA) Officer and Mr Charitha Waduge Admissions, Recruitment and Widening Access (ARWA) Officer
    • English language requirements and pre-sessional English support – Mr Scott Bushell, Head of International Recruitment and School of Click English
    • Student finance – Mr Rhonan Dunphy, SLC Manager
  • See what our students say – Video presentation
  • Student panel – Q & A with students
  • Q&A

Find out more about the courses we are recruiting for June / July 2021 intakes

  • BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year
  • BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care with Foundation Year
  • BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year
  • BSc (Hons) Business Management
  • BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care
  • BEng (Hons) Software Engineering
  • BSc (Hons) Computing 
  • BSc (Hons) Business Management (Top-Up)

How to Access the Virtual Open Day

Our Recruitment team will send you an email before the Virtual Open Day, informing you which online platform they will be using and how you can access it. We will host our Virtual Open Day on Zoom or Microsoft Teams, so please read the emails from Regent College London beforehand.
